title: National Cinema and Culture
description: Study of a specific cinematic or other media tradition of a region, nation, language, diasporic collectivity or other unifying cultural entity. Not a survey, this course selects one focus or offers a comparative of cross-cultural framework. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): FILM 130, FILM 132A, FILM 132B, or FILM 132C.
